column5: Hiya folks..... As of late I am noticing that after each main post on a topic, the responses are not linked or threaded in a continuous chain as they used to be. I now have to click on each of the responses listed after the main post. Did I bugger sumpin' up or is this a new design thingy??  Meely
Try messing around with the options button on the right hand side up there....
see I got no solutions or suggestions ...just smart  comments  must be this lack of fishing bug ,,,seems to be goin around.  Glad someone could actually help  TB
Dave if it aint to cold forya,Im heading out Friday. Send a pm if interested.  Meely,ya gots to be around more often, to stay on top of things around here.LOL
